Module com.example.cab302assessment10b0101
Package com.example.cab302assessment10b0101.model

Interface LoanDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockLoanDAO
public interface LoanDAOInterface
The LoanDAOInterface defines the contract for data access operations related to Loan objects. It specifies methods for inserting new loans, retrieving loans by user, deleting loans, and finding loan IDs by user and book.

  • Method Details

    • insertLoan

      void insertLoan(Loan loan)
      Inserts a new loan into the data store.
      Parameters:
      loan - The Loan object to be inserted.

    • getAllLoansByUser

      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Loan> getAllLoansByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves all loans associated with a specific user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose loans to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Loan objects for the specified user.

    • deleteLoan

      void deleteLoan(Loan loan)
      Deletes a specific loan from the data store.
      Parameters:
      loan - The Loan object to be deleted.

    • getLoanIdByUserAndBook

      int getLoanIdByUserAndBook(int userId, int bookId)
      Retrieves the loan ID by user and book.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user associated with the loan.
      bookId - The ID of the book associated with the loan.
      Returns:
      The loan ID if found, otherwise -1.
